title: Far Orion: New Worlds
description: Far Orion: New Worlds is an action game where you can command a team of brave heroes and lead your world to victory! The year is 2121, and technology has advanced far beyond the bounds of our wildest fantasies, but great progress also demands a great sacrifice. Use your strategy to set up your heroes and power card, beat all your opponents, and explore other worlds in search of treasure and limitless power!
